title: Apprentice In Training!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Washi washi washi~~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Kyaaah! Fufufu, that’s good, Ayumu~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Phew. I think I’m used to the novice version now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>You’re right. Do you always practice with Rina?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah, we do it together. Ah, that’s right, Rina-chan told me that she also wants to introduce it to Mia-chan. Can we teach her both the trial and the novice version?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Let’s see.... If you’re going to do it, then we might as well teach her the next level too♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>You mean.... We’ll finally learn the real thing!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>No no♪ You’ve still got some ways to go until the real thing. What comes after the novice version.... is the washi washi almost-complete version~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>W-, wow! We’re getting so close to the true washi washi, huh!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, alright, let’s go practice then. Take this~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
